title: Sierra Sparkles Through the Drama
description:
This week on “Bachelor Happy Hour,” Sierra stops by to break down all the drama from this week’s episode of “The Bachelor.” 

In her conversation with Becca and Serena, Sierra explains why she spilled the tea about Cassidy to Clayton, the difference between living through Shrimpgate and watching it back, and her theory on why Shanae went after Elizabeth in the first place. Plus, she shares the science behind her luminescent body glitter routine and discusses exactly what went through her mind when Shanae crashed the group date after-party.  

Then, in her Bachelor Fashion Breakdown, Serena reveals her favorite looks from this week’s episode, and in a game of Bachelor Superlatives, Sierra shares her opinions of the other women in the mansion.  

“Bachelor Happy Hour” has exclusive interviews every week. Watch “The Bachelor” on ABC and listen to “Bachelor Happy Hour” the next morning.  

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.  

Thanks to our sponsors:

Prose: Prose.com/Bachelor
